preconditions.precondition: Member wants to share a work

mainSequence.step: Member selects to share a work
UIM displays the file share form
Member views the file share form
Application shows the file share form
Member fills in content name, content type, and uploads file
Application displays the file analysis result to Member
Application asks for confirmation to send
Application copies the file to "To moderate" directory
Application saves the transaction in the log file
Application transmits the transaction and file to the server
Server notifies the Librarian of the submitted work
Application notifies Member of the waiting for moderation
